messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] quitters never win....
messages.msgSnippet: ... ~Nancy who had decided to take some gentle advice yesterday to let this one go and quit responding, but just couldn t resist. I was the one with the gentle
messages.messageBody:
Quote 1:
> I know when to quit.
> Myranda
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Quote 2:
~Nancy who had decided to take some gentle advice yesterday to let this one
go and quit responding, but just couldn't resist.



I was the one with the gentle advice! Hah! You can now all giggle! <G>

And I just can't help but respond to Quote 1!!!

But I really try to know when to quit. Our suggestions are not going to
change anything. She's made up her mind and we're all just talking to hear
ourselves....??? maybe typing to hear our keyboards click??? Maybe if we all
ignore it, it will go away---or at least not push our buttons. Let it die. Or
it will go on & on & on & on.....

Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
